text:
pkg_resources is adding module members by modifying globals(), using something like this

```
def _declare_state(vartype, **kw):
    globals().update(kw)
    _state_vars.update(dict.fromkeys(kw, vartype))
```

While it would be nice to support this idiom in the future, meanwhile, we could add to the current pkg_resources brain tip whatever is missing.
title: Add brain tip for pkg_resources._namespace_packages
